legal_basis: s. 111 of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board Act
procedural_fairness: failed to inform applicant of oral hearing rights
evidence_assessment: Dr. Murdoch's report qualifies as new evidence under Palmer criteria but was dismissed as speculative by VRAB without credibility analysis
decision_reasoning: VRAB committed jurisdictional error, violated procedural fairness, and improperly applied legal test
application_details: Veteran sought disability pension due to neck injury from military service
procedure_followed: Judicial review application challenging VRAB’s refusal to reconsider earlier decision based on new evidence and procedural fairness
result_of_case: VRAB’s decision set aside; case remitted for reconsideration ensuring acceptance of credible evidence and opportunity for oral submissions
